text_block_list.text: Suzuka…?!
Haa… haa… a dream…?
[Takarazuka Kinen] was coming up soon - Silence Suzuka was diligently training in preparation for that grand stage.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Hyaaa~, such amazing speed right from the start! As always, Suzuka's running is awesome…!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Something that nobody can replicate, that Uma Musume can only call a dream-like run…! I get excited just from watching!
Right at the start, Silence Suzuka surged forward at top speed.
With speed almost as if the goal was right infront of her, even if the goal was still further ahead.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Normally, around here your speed would start to falter… but in Suzuka-san's case, it's just the beginning!
At that, Silence Suzuka strongly kicked at the ground, accelerating.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Fuwaaa~! She just keeps increasing her speed!
It's almost as if Silence Suzuka is showing that dream-like run to excite the fans, the Uma Musume, and even herself.
Every time she runs, Silence Suzuka just keeps improving. At this rate, how far will she be able to go?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The running-style you two are aiming for is a big unknown. It is possible that it might be something outside the limits of what an Uma Musume can do.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In that case, at that time her legs…
Suzuka…?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-what's wrong, Trainer-san?
Eh… uh. No, it's nothing…
Eh… uh. No, it's nothing…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Haa… Fuu…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Welcome back, Suzuka-san! You've updated your time again!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I could kind of tell while I was running. It felt like there was a bit more resistance.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: If it's like this, [Takarazuka Kinen] is a definite win! Isn't that right, Trainer-san?
…Ah, yeah… that's right.
…Ah, yeah… that's right.
Ever since the day that Agnes Tachyon spoke with me, I'd been searching through documents regarding other Uma Musumes' injuries.
What conditions were present when they occurred. And when they occurred, what kind of situation awaited-
Even though I was trying to do this to drive away my unease, the more and more I investigated, the more my uneasiness grew.
(Subject 1. Overwhelming Debut victory. Highly anticipated second race.)
(With perfect timing, uncharacteristic of a recent Debut, rushed forward on the final straight.)
(Next moment, tumbled to the ground. Disqualified. Leg unable to endure exerted force. Fracture. - Forced retirement.)
(Subject 2, Senior Class top performer. Attempting to extend Consecutive Major victories. Final corner, outside, accelerating at high speed.)
(Mid-corner, sudden slowdown. Unable to continue to goal.)
(Disqualified due to injury. - Unable to fully recover…)
(Even after all these other incidents, there are still innumerable documents containing these bitter feelings…)
(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries are an ever-present worry…)
(That means that for Uma Musume, injuries are an ever-present worry…)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Pardon me.
Suzuka…?
Dinner time had ended at this point, but Silence Suzuka came in still dressed in her jersey.
She's probably planning to do more independent training. To continue polishing her running style… to increase her speed even more.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer-san… lately, it seems like you've been staying late and working…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Could it be, there's some kind of problem with my running? As things are, will I be unable to win [Takarazuka Kinen]…?
(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's more like there's no race you can't win)
(No, you're wrong… the way you are now, you'll definitely win [Takarazuka Kinen]. If anything, it's more like there's no race you can't win)
(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)
(I want to tell her that her running is so overpowering, she'll definitely win. But it might be so overwhelming, that I…)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes…
Silence Suzuka cast an anxious glance at me.
To chase her dream, she took the risk of transferring to this team, and since she's come here, Silence Suzuka can finally see her dream starting to materialize.
I shouldn't try to stop this girl so earnestly chasing her dream, but my mind is so hazy, I'm unable to even answer her properly.
Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with your legs and body, right?
Well… there's not really any important reason for it. That aside, you've got a race coming up… there's nothing wrong with your legs and body, right?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Am I pushing myself too hard, is that what you're asking…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: If that's the case, I'm fine. It's right before a race, after all. I'm being very careful.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: On top of that, I'm still feeling very fulfilled. There's absolutely nothing that's causing me any worry.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Because, I have-
Silence Suzuka looked like she wanted to say more. Her expression was very soft, and there was no sign of any uneasiness at all.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Nevermind… well then, I'll be off to do some independent training. Trainer-san don't push yourself too hard either.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, at [Takarazuka Kinen], let's see that "scenery" together.
The "scenery" I'm chasing together with Silence Suzuka-
[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, and what "scenery" will she show me?
[Takarazuka Kinen]. What "scenery" will she see there, and what "scenery" will she show me?
Will it be crossing the goal with an amazing time recorded?
Or will it be the powerful sight of her never giving the lead to any of those strong opponents-

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Silence Suzuka runs in the lead! Now she's heading around behind the big Zelkova tree!
(No! That "scenery", I absolutely refuse to let that happen!!)
(I need to search through even more documents. At the very least, identify this premonition, and in the worst case, at that time just have her stop-)
Thinking that, I once again glance at those documents but-
Huh…? My vision is…
Huh…? My vision is…
